p: Rosin-polycaprolactone flexible dianhydride are solids with a melting point depending on the length of oligoester diol chain. They can be synthesized from rosin, oligocaprolactone diols and maleic anhydride according to Scheme 24 and using vacuum evaporation as a separation method [ 97]. Their application is bio-based curing agent for epoxy resins [ 97].
